messages.subject: Re: 29 is still little
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/31/03 7:14:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ...
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/31/03 7:14:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> <<How come I am always the only parent going down the slide at the
> playground?>>
<<Is there an age limit I
don't know about? >>

If there is, I must be way over it. I'm 46 and get on everything--swings,
slides, plastic mountain, teeter totters. I roll down hills and try to coax
the ball into the basket. The only thing I won't get on, at the old parks that
haven't been renovated, are the puke wheels. I'm not athletic at all, but I
can keep up with my son and HAVE FUN!
Mary J


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
